mapper.select: SELECT U.USER_ID AS USER_ID, U.PASSWORD AS LOGIN_PW, U.USER_NM AS NAME, U.EMAIL_ADRES AS EMAIL, U.EMPL_NO AS EMPLOYEE_NO, U.USER_SLVL AS SECURITY_LVL, U.EMPLYR_STTUS_CODE AS STTUS_CD, U.DEPT_ID AS DEPT_ID , O.DEPT_NM AS DEPT_NM, U.POSI_ID AS POSI_ID, P.POSI_NM AS POSI_NAME, U.DUTY_ID AS DUTY_ID, D.DUTY_NM AS DUTY_NAME FROM CO_OR_USER U LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_OR_DEPT O ON O.DEPT_ID = U.DEPT_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_OR_POSI P ON P.POSI_ID = U.POSI_ID LEFT OUTER JOIN CO_OR_DUTY D ON D.DUTY_ID = U.DUTY_ID WHERE EMPLYR_ID = #{loginId}
